about_the_game:
Roaming The Stars is a vast space-exploration survival game. Where you can build bases and spaceships while you explore a series of planets and moons with many colors and different plants and resources. You will encounter many enemies along the way trying to interfere with your great adventure.

Planet/Moon/Sun Features:
-Each body in space IS moving, that star over there, yep that's moving... That moon? Also a yes.
-Atmospheres
-Planets and moons orbit each other and are influenced by one another
-Sun has a life cycle (it's active around 10 minutes compared to 7-10 billion years and the white dwarf part or the "inactive part" lasts around 1-5 hours)
*This list will grow as more features are added



Features (to be done by Early Access):
-Full Survival
-Many building options
-Enemies on the ground, in the sky (flying in planetary atmospheres), and in space
-Ai bases, you can raid them and use them as a place to build structures of your own
*This list will grow as more features are added

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i-5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Runs best on an SSD

short_description: A sandbox, space-exploration survival game where you can build bases and explore other planets and moons around the star Craterous.
